app.title: SDG 15.3.1: Proportion of land that is degraded over total land area

clim_regim.per_pixel: Per pixel based  on global climate data

mask.pixel: Extract from the land cover data

lceu.calculate: Calculate based on land cover and soil texture

error.wrong_year:
The year are not set in the corret order.
start < target_year < end
error.no_start: Please provide a start date for baseline period
error.no_target: please provide a start date of assemsment period
error.no_end: Please provide a end date for the assesment period
error.no_traj: Please provide a trajectory for the trend analysis
error.no_mix: You cannot mix sentinel, modis and landsat data
error.no_vi: Please provide a vegetation index for the productivity analysis
error.no_lceu: Please provide a land cover ecosystem functional units source

process_text: This process tile will allow you to compute the value of the sdg indicator 15.3.1 and its sub-indicators (land cover, soil organic carbon and productivity)
result_text: Once the layers are loaded on the map, click on the "download" button to download the indicators `.tif` files to your SEPAL folders
result_text_zonalstats: Once the result is ready, click on the "download" button to download the statistics (`.shp`) to your SEPAL folder.
lceu_lbl: Select Land cover ecosystem functional units
prod_lookup_lbl: Select a look up table to combine productivity metrics
start_lc: Land Cover Image corresponding to start year
end_lc: Land Cover Image corresponding to end year
trend_start_lbl: Productivity trend assessment period starts in
trend_end_lbl: Productivity trend assessment period ends in
state_start_lbl: Productivity state assessment period starts in
state_end_lbl: Productivity state assessment period ends in
performance_start_lbl: Productivity performance assessment period starts in
performance_end_lbl: Productivity performance assessment period ends in
landcover_t_start_lbl: Land cover assessment year starts in
landcover_t_end_lbl: Land cover assessment year end in
matrix_changed: You have changed your transition matrix
map_loading_complete: All the layers are loaded on the Map
stats_complete: The statistics are now avaliable in the {} file of your computer or downloadable with the result tile link

error.no_file: The files are not available in your Gdrive

download.file_exist: The file {} is already available on your computer
download.start_download: Start the exportation of your maps
download.remove_gdrive: Remove the files from your Gdrive folder

gee.add_layer: Loading the layer ({}) on the map

select_lc.not_image: The asset need to be a valid GEE ee.Image
select_lc.not_proper_code: The land cover is not reclassified using the selected classfication system. Please use the customize panel to reclassify the land cover.
select_lc.not_proper_code_subset: The pixel values of land cover category are not mentioned in the transition matrix. Please use the customize panel to reclassify the land cover.
select_lc.diff_land_cover: The two land cover dataset need to be different.
select_lc.min_max_error: The minimumum and maximum pixels values for lnd cover need to be greater than 9 and less than 100
select_lc.transition_code_error: The transition codes need to be 1 for improved transition, 0 for statble and -1 for degraded transition
select_lc.lc_class_mismatch: The class labels/names for the initial and target land cover need to be same
select_lc.custom_matrix_bool: Would you like to upload a custom transition matrix?
select_lc.default_matrix_bool: Would you like to modify the default transition matrix?
